title: Jakub Miszczyszyn
text:
I am a specialist in geoinformatics, remote sensing, and spatial data analysis. As a technician, I actively support the scientific and educational activities at the University of Agriculture in Krakow, including serving as the supervisor of the Geomatics Section of the Forestry Studentsâ€™ Scientific Association.
My experience includes: Programming in R, Operating drones, acquiring data using LiDAR technology, as well as multispectral and thermal cameras. I am passionate about photography and studying forest ecosystems, combining modern technologies with practical applications in environmental protection.
My mission is to promote sustainable natural resource management by implementing innovative technological solutions.

title: Welcome to My Blog
text:
Why This Blog?
As a researcher and forestry enthusiast, I created this blog to share insights from my academic journey and professional projects. My goal is to blend technology and environmental science, especially in areas like:

Forest ecosystem monitoring using drones, LiDAR, and multispectral cameras.
Developing innovative methods for sustainable forest management.
Sharing my personal experiences from research and teaching.

Iâ€™m currently affiliated with the University of Agriculture in Krakow, where I actively contribute to scientific and educational activities. You can explore my university profile here.

title: Welcome to My Blog
text:
Links to My Work
Here are some additional ways to connect with me and explore my projects:

GitHub â€“ where I share my coding projects, primarily in R.
ResearchGate â€“ for my latest publications and research updates.
University Profile â€“ for more details about my academic work.

title: Welcome to My Blog
text:
Whatâ€™s Next?
Through this blog, Iâ€™ll dive into exciting topics such as:

The role of remote sensing in sustainable forestry.
Practical tutorials in GIS and R programming for ecological data analysis.
Reflections on my doctoral research and fieldwork in forestry.

Iâ€™m also passionate about photography and exploring the natural world through technology. Stay tuned for upcoming posts where Iâ€™ll share stories from the field and insights into my work.

Thank you for joining me on this journey! Feel free to reach out, share your thoughts, or collaborate through the links above. Letâ€™s make sustainable forest management a reality together!
Cheers,
Jakub Miszczyszyn
